name: Duel in the Desert (GM48)
description:
Duel in the Desert is a duel shooter set in the Wild West that tests your accuracy and reflexes. You take control of a skilled duelist fighting his way 1v1 through stages of rugged bandits.

The game has 5 stages with increasing difficulty. You only get one bullet per stage.
If you miss, you are dead. Make your shots count!

This was my first entry to a game jam ever and I hope you enjoy it!
